pageContent: Purpose: Low temperature sensitive liposome (LTSL) encapsulated docetaxel were combined with mild hyperthermia (40-42°C) to investigate in vivo biodistribution and efficacy against a castrate resistant prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Salvage HIFU for recurrent prostate cancer after radiotherapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18852702/
